amendment.description: To increase funds for Head Start.

action.text: Amendment SA 1597 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1597 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 47. Record Vote Number: 333.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1597.
Amendment SA 1597 proposed by Senator Dodd to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR S11226-11227; text: CR S11226) To increase funds for Head Start.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1597 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 47. Record Vote Number: 333.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1597 proposed by Senator Dodd to Amendment SA 1542.
